name: mountain landscape using perling noise
description: I used perlin noises for the birds and the mountains, This is an Asian mountain landscape in water color style, I would like to create a peaceful feeling. Future possible steps might be have Chinese letters writing, add peaceful music, let the bird fly.

name: molna variation
description: I changed color to black and green from molna's example, and I also add mouse interative feature for it, the pattern changes depending on where the mouse is.

name: oscillator objects variation
description: This is a varation from The Nature of Code's Oscillator Objects, it is a little meditative, shows stability and movement.

name: Gravitational attraction variation
description: The Element's movement toward the Attractor feels unstoppable, like a planet being pulled into orbit by a larger object. It draws a pattern would look like a bright, swirling vortex with a glowing center.

name: not finished
description: here I will do a tree full of spring feeling
